articles.description: The bank's shares closed down 11% to $25.90 on Monday, after BlockFi bankruptcy filing.

articles.title: NASA, ICON Advance Lunar Construction Technology for Moon Missions - NASA
articles.description: As NASA plans for long-term human exploration of the Moon under Artemis, new technologies are required to meet the unique challenges of living and working on another world.
